---
title: "zipkin.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML file (`zipkin.yml`) is a configuration file for tracing settings, specifically for the Zipkin exporter. It enables tracing and sets up the Zipkin endpoint for sending trace data.

## Symbols

### `tracing`
#### Description
The root configuration object for tracing settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Enables tracing functionality
- Specifies Zipkin as the tracing exporter
- Configures the Zipkin endpoint for sending trace data

### `tracing.enabled`
#### Description
A boolean flag that determines whether tracing is enabled or not.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| enabled | boolean | When set to `true`, tracing is enabled |

### `tracing.exporter`
#### Description
Specifies the tracing exporter to be used.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| exporter | string | Set to "zipkin" to use the Zipkin exporter |

### `tracing.zipkin`
#### Description
Configuration object for Zipkin-specific settings.

### `tracing.zipkin.endpoint`
#### Description
Specifies the URL endpoint where Zipkin trace data should be sent.

#### Inputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| endpoint | string | The URL of the Zipkin API endpoint for sending trace data |

## References
This configuration file relates to the `TracingConfig` and `ZipkinTracingConfig` structs defined in the `internal/config/tracing.go` file. The YAML structure matches the fields in these structs:

- `tracing.enabled` corresponds to `TracingConfig.Enabled`
- `tracing.exporter` corresponds to `TracingConfig.Exporter`
- `tracing.zipkin.endpoint` corresponds to `ZipkinTracingConfig.Endpoint`

## Dependencies
This configuration relies on the Zipkin tracing system being available at the specified endpoint.

## Configuration
The configuration options defined in this file are:

| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| tracing.enabled | boolean | true | Enables or disables tracing |
| tracing.exporter | string | "zipkin" | Specifies the tracing exporter to use |
| tracing.zipkin.endpoint | string | "http://localhost:9999/api/v2/spans" | The Zipkin API endpoint for sending trace data |

Note: The default values mentioned here are specific to this configuration file. The actual default values in the application may differ, as seen in the `setDefaults` method of `TracingConfig` in the related code snippet.
